articles.author: Namita Singh
articles.title: US airline chiefs warn 5G could cause ‘catastrophic’ flight disruption and strand thousands of Americans - The Independent
articles.description: Airline industry leaders say the deployment of new 5G mobile internet technology could lead to the grounding of a number of flights
articles.content:
AT&T and Verizon have said they will delay activating some 5G masts around airports after aviation bosses warned that signals could have a catastrophic effect on air travel.
